subject: Caribbean and  Mexico Vacations -- save up to 70%
body:
Caribbean and  Mexico Vacations -- save up to 70%




You 
      are receiving this custom newsletter because you signed up to receive 
      theTravel Deals Alert newsletter from Cheapflights.com.



May 15, 2007












This Summer, take the Family to the Caribbean or Mexico 
							from $559*!

KIDS STAY & EAT FREE
							At prices like these, everyone can enjoy a 
							5- or 7-night summer vacation at their favorite all inclusive resort.  All packages include air, meals, drinks, activities, travel insurance, transfers & more!

Book By May 21! Availability is limited!




						EXCLUSIVE SAVINGS
						*All prices are per person, based on adult double occupancy.
						All packages include airfare, hotel, meals, beverages, activities, gratuities, travel insurance & transfers.
